Method Detail

createDatabaseAndTables

public static void createDatabaseAndTables(java.lang.String derbySystemHome)
Loads the derby embedded driver and creates/loads the database If the database is being created for the first time and not been booted up then the corresponding tables in the database will be created.

Parameters:
derbySystemHome - String containing the value to which the System property derby.system.home will be set to

shutdownDatabase

public static void shutdownDatabase()
Shuts down the database A successful shutdown results in an SQLException and no other exception is obtained.

string value in this property list with the specified key value.

queryDB

public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> queryDB(java.lang.String sql)
Parameters:
sql - query used in querying the database
Returns:
ArrayList<HashMap<String,Object>> containg the records in the database

queryDB

public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> queryDB(java.lang.String sql,
                                                                                         boolean showSQL)
Queries the database with the SQL query provided by sql. Each row is put in a HashMap<String,Object> where the keys are table column names
and the values are the corredponding table column values for the row. The HashMap<String,Object>(s) created is(are) put in a an ArrayList and returned

Parameters:
sql - query used in querying the database
showSQL - indidicates whether the sql should be logged true or not false
Returns:
ArrayList<HashMap<String,Object>> containg the records in the database

updateDB

public boolean updateDB(java.lang.String sqlStmt)
Updates a database

Parameters:
sqlStmt - query used to update information in the database
Returns:
boolean indicating a successful operation true or not

updateDB

public boolean updateDB(java.lang.String sql,
                        boolean showSQL)
Updates the database

Parameters:
sql - query used to update information in the database
showSQL - indidicates whether the sql should be logged true or not false
Returns:
boolean indicating a successful operation true or not
